phrases: Okay, Vegeta- chan, now it is our turn.
You two little pipsqueaks there, give Vegeta- chan a hand.
Use as many dirty tricks as you need to.
Do not kill the little ones!
We are going to kill them, after all!
Leave a little treat for us, too!
Hey, what is going on here?
Vegeta- chan's power level just rose to upwards of 30,000!
He ended it all in one instant.
Vegeta has ridiculous strength, all right.
Hey, it could not be, right?
H- he is taken hardly any damage at all!
That is enough for the warm-up exercises.
ReaCoom is trying to look cool, and we are getting all dusty over here!
Our cleaning bill is going to be outrageous.
W- what kind of monster is he?
How is it that we have to get the Dragon Balls back from someone like this?
That was close, that was close.
I have to make sure to deliver these to Freeza- sama.
scouting industrial space, commercial space, and residential space.
Perhaps I will make it a planet for exiles.
There are any number of planets like this one in the universe.
I doubt there would be any value in going to the trouble of developing it.
I will be acquiring the Dragon Balls shortly, so I will have no further business here.
As we are leaving, I will turn this planet into fireworks.
Are there any other planets we can sell for development at a high price?
Y- yes, sir, I will investigate at once.
That is pretty good, Vegeta- chan!
You are better than I thought, huh?
What is the matter, Vegeta- chan?
You cannot possibly be finished after that, right?
You are still pretty spirited, huh?
Do not tell me you have kicked the bucket already, have you?
Nice, nice, that is more like it.
There is the reason why Freeza- sama adored you so much, long ago, huh?
But why would you turn your back on him, Vegeta- chan?
ReaCoom is the same as ever, huh?
He is got a nasty personality.
Do not you have any techniques with more panache than that?
If not, then it is about time I killed you.
To think he would be this strong...
lt's almost as though he is treating me like a toddler...
lf it keeps going like this, l'm going to get killed by him...
I- if Vegeta gets done in, then it will be our turn to get killed next.
M- make no mistake, there is no way we can beat him.
I am sure that not even Goku could.
At this point, it is all or nothing.
The life of a flower is so short, huh?
Okay, I will finish you with this.
All right... let us go, Gohan!
Vegeta does not have the strength left to avoid ReaCoom's quick attacks.
W- who asked you to do that!?
If you had time to rescue me, why did not you attack ReaCoom!?
For crying out loud, your softness makes me want to vomit!
The ground's surface has been blown away, and the planet's shape has changed...
That sneak attack just now was a pretty good one.
Coming down from directly above shut my mouth.
As a result, my teeth are messed up.
I think I might be a little bit mad.
Let me take out these two little squirts, too!
In exchange, you are going to treat us to chocolate parfaits later!
With just one hit... this is what happens to me...
And after having Grand Elder- san raise my power, too...
I- I am no use at all...
S- shake it off, Kuririn- san!
We are powerless against them, and if we run, they will catch us right away...
And the Dragon Balls have been taken from us...
There is nothing good about this...
I could not help myself, and hit him too hard.
I was planning to play around with him a little more, but too bad.
Now then, for the next little pipsqueak's turn...
I- I will do as much as I can!
Will Gohan be able to get through this greatest of pinches?
